headline: 11 Investment Must Reads for This Week (Aug. 26, 2025)
summary: Growth in the use of ETFs and SMAs is changing how muni portfolios are constructed, reports Bond Buyer. Morningstar gives investors a closer look at potential pitfalls of using funds of funds. These are among the investment must-reads we found this week for financial advisors.

headline: This 19-Year-Old Has A $60K Net Worth—But His Biggest Challenge Isn't What You'd Think
summary: A recent portfolio review by financial educator Humphrey Yang revealed surprising insights about young investors, including a teenager who’s already crushing financial milestones that most adults struggle to reach. The analysis of real subscriber portfolios across different age groups shows that success often comes down to one critical factor: staying the course.
